entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
